name: Free Google Maps
author: AGILELOGIX

sections.description:
Free Google Maps is a WordPress Map Plugin that renders Smooth Open street Maps over WordPress Page/Post using easy shortcode.

How you use it? [wp-map]

Some Highlighted Features

  • Highly Responsive UI Design
  • Location Management for unlimited Markers
  • Category Management with Markers
  • API Key insertion Option
  • Set Default Lat/Lng for Map
  • Stylish InfoBox
  • GeoLocation API Supported
  • Draggable Marker to PinPoint Location in Admin
  • Customize the Default Zoom Level From Admin Panel
  • Enable/Disable a Store
  • Multilingual plugins
  • and so much more

Try our new STORE LOCATOR PLUGIN, Google Maps

Documentation
Complete documentation of Store Locator with ShortCodes documentation.
sections.installation:
Installation of this plugin is pretty easy.

  1. Upload the extracted plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation, or upload it directly from your plugins section in the WordPress admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. That’s it!Installation of this plugin is pretty easy.

  4. Upload the extracted plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation, or upload it directly from your plugins section in the WordPress admin panel.

  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  6. That’s it!
sections.faq:
How can i use this plugin?

To show WP MAP on a Page or Post, use short code [wp-map], add locations from backend.

Create a ticket in support for further queries.

Thank You

Agile Maps is a WordPress Map Plugin that renders Smooth Open street Maps over WordPress Page/Post using easy shortcode.

How you use it? [wp-map]

Thank you for using WP Maps, please report if you found any problem that will be fixed immediately
